title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page i. the first and second column could be merged j.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label, which makes it difficult to identify its purpose. Only single item selection is allowed, so the 'move up' / 'move down' feature cannot be applied to multiple items. The signature preview is not a label that wraps the text. The signature preview does not have the same background color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should have a smaller size. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label to indicate its purpose. Multiple selection should be allowed, so the 'move up' / 'move down' feature can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview must be a label that wraps the text. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
